Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock hit 74, the highest score for South Africa in the match
Aiden Markram contributed 46 runs for South Africa
Kagiso Rabada took an early wicket, ending the partnership between Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh
Tabraiz Shamsi was effective with the ball, conceding only 24 runs
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa stayed unbeaten in the tournament
The pitch was batter-friendly, allowing the top-order to perform well
USA showed resilience and nearly won the match
South Africa's bowlers conceded 148 runs in 12 overs, struggling to contain USA's lower order
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's players expressed satisfaction with the win
The coach highlighted the team's resilience in securing the first Super Eight point
Miscellaneous Highlights: Andries Gous, born in the USA, played against his home country
Keshav Maharaj bowled economically with figures of 1 for 24
USA's bowlers conceded 66 runs in four overs, particularly against the lower order
